steps.deniedMessage: Permission to use the motion sensors is required for this assessment.
steps.title: Go No Go Test
steps.detail: This activity evaluates the time it takes for you to respond to a visual cue without making false reactions.

steps.title: Go No Go Test
steps.detail: Shake the device in any direction as soon as the blue dot appears on screen. Do not shake for a green dot. You will be asked to do this 9 times.
Quickly shake the device when the blue dot appears. Do not shake for a green dot.
